oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Full Gospel Jesus Church service home movie, 1973
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Vance, Mary
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Video recording of a service officiated by unknown person with large number of members. Unknown officiant handles three serpents. Several other members handle serpents. Men and women handling fire. Band members playing music. Home footage of congregates with Johnny Holbrook and Larry Elledge. Sign outside of church "The full Gospel Jesus Church". Members drinking strychnine. Member with swollen bit hand stays through service.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Appalachian Region -- Religious life and customs; Dance -- Religious aspects; Snakebites; Snake cults (Holiness churches) -- Appalachian Region
Elledge, Larry; Holbrook, Johnny
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Jesus Name tradition services home movies
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: Mary Vance Jesus Name Tradition photographs and home movies
